Body:
specs = Specifications()
specs.constant_rates = True
tax_func_path = os.path.join(CUR_PATH, 'TxFuncEst_baseline.pkl')
specs.get_tax_function_parameters(None, run_micro=False, tax_func_path=
    tax_func_path)
assert specs.etr_params.shape == (specs.T, specs.S, 12)
assert specs.mtrx_params.shape == (specs.T, specs.S, 12)
assert specs.mtry_params.shape == (specs.T, specs.S, 12)
assert np.allclose(specs.etr_params[:, :, :10], np.zeros((specs.T, specs.S,
    10)))
assert np.allclose(specs.mtrx_params[:, :, :10], np.zeros((specs.T, specs.S,
    10)))
assert np.allclose(specs.mtry_params[:, :, :10], np.zeros((specs.T, specs.S,
    10)))
